body_text:
We sort of do this differently in certain components - in some we just pass an object of functions ({ loadExtensionListingColumns }) and other times we use bindActionCreators.
@rehandalal Is there any reason we should use one syntax over the other? If they're the same, I'd suggest just going with the object for brevity.
body:
We sort of do this differently in certain components - in some we just pass an object of functions (`{ loadExtensionListingColumns }`) and other times we use `bindActionCreators`.

@rehandalal Is there any reason we should use one syntax over the other? If they're the same, I'd suggest just going with the object for brevity.
body_html:
We sort of do this differently in certain components - in some we just pass an object of functions ({ loadExtensionListingColumns }) and other times we use bindActionCreators.

@rehandalal Is there any reason we should use one syntax over the other? If they're the same, I'd suggest just going with the object for brevity.
